mapper.select: select skill_code, skill_name, skill_enabled from skill
SELECT POSITION_ID, POSITION_NAME, POSITION_ENABLED FROM POSITION

choose.when:
insert into SKILL (SKILL_CODE,SKILL_NAME, SKILL_ENABLED) select 'SK'||sk_seq.nextval, A.* from(
select #{list.skill_name} as skill_name, #{list.skill_enabled} as skill_enabled from dual ) A

insert into p_field (field_CODE,field_NAME, field_ENABLED) select 'PF'||pf_seq.nextval, A.* from(
select #{list.field_name} as field_name, #{list.field_enabled} as field_enabled from dual ) A

insert into position (position_id,position_NAME, position_ENABLED) select 'POS'||pos_seq.nextval, A.* from(
select #{list.position_name} as position_name, #{list.position_enabled} as position_enabled from dual ) A
